SINGAPORE, Dec 30 (Reuters) - Singapore began vaccinating healthcare workers with Pfizer-BioNTech's COVID-19 vaccine on Wednesday, kicking off one of Asia's… [+2407 chars]

articles.title: New app can be used as proof you've been vaccinated for COVID-19 - KHOU 11
articles.description: A new app that certifies a person has been vaccinated for COVID-19 could help get the world back on track a little bit faster.More: https://www.khou.com/arti...
